description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. My Band is a musical game offering to the player the ability to create a band and compose their own music with a Pad or any instruments compatible with the XBox 360.
description.short: My Band is a musical game offering to the player the ability to create a band and compose their own music with a Pad or any instruments compatible with the XBox 360.
